pageContext.claim: “The Democrats want to increase everybody's taxes by a lot. They want to do things that are going to be a disaster, regulations all over the place. And if you do that, you're going to have a crash, and it will crash like crazy. And that's one of the reasons that the stock market right now would be up even more if there was no possibility that a guy like Biden, that has no idea, he's had 47 years of failure. Everything he's touched it's been a failure. And if he got in, you will have, mark my words, a crash.”
pageContext.analysis: This is fear-mongering. If Biden wins, stocks and money will not be worthless. Biden mostly wants to repeal some of Trump's tax cuts.
